title: Her Monstrous Valentines
description: I summoned a monster who can only be banished after he makes me feel good. Really good. All I wanted was some tea after a hard day, but the recipe in my grandmother’s book turned out to be a spell. One minute I’m alone. The next, I’ve summoned a minotaur. The only way to send him back? He has to bring me to a screaming release.When the family’s protective elf catches wind of all the noise we’re making and comes running, I quickly learn that three is not a crowd.Unfortunately, I come from a long line of monster hunters and while I refuse to participate in the barbaric hunt, my family still practices it religiously. When they find out about my lovers, I’m forced to choose–find a way to protect them from my family or banish them from the human realm forever. Her Monstrous Valentines is a MFM monster romance novella, with light BDSM, dark themes, and a guaranteed HEA.
author: Honor St. Jean
